channel.title: Derp-Scape (Taking suggestions for a new name)
channel.description:
[u][b]Details:[/b][/u] [font=courier]Base: InsidiaX PI Coders: Dustin (Me) & Geoff Forums: Still in progress I will add them soon.[/font]
[center]Project: I recently just started coding PI's about 2 months ago which was around the time I started coding again in general. I didn't think I would actually wanna release a server but as I worked on it I really felt that I could possibly make and release a good enough server for people to play on. I hope to get players when I do release but if I don't then I don't what can I do about it? I am still learning alot about coding PI base servers and I don't plan to have a release real soon but I do plan to have a release. So I hope that you guys can give me some ideas and help me out along the way and wish me luck!(: Thanks guys!
Server Information: -Economy Is getting cleaned up to perfect -Donator Island is very unique and has lots to do -There are certain areas for donors only -Very good pking with working SOL and things like that -Working curses -Has pk shops and slayer point shop -Almost all skills are 100% Herblore, Farming and Firemaking are the only three that I know aren't -Npc's drop items such as: Godswords, Bandos armor, Arma armor etc... -There is also Summoning and Hunter, Summoning needs some work but nothing much -Working teletabs -Frost Dragons with good drops -Full brimhaven and taverly dungeons -Perfect teleport GFX -Custom skill ( Pking ) Thanks to InsidiaX -Really nice skilling spot but it may be changed I don't know yet
Note: I will be adding more to this thread don't worry(: I am taking name suggestions for server(: The server has some bugs that need worked out If anyone wants to be a developer just PM me and tell me what you can do to help(: Interfaces are really basic most servers have them from what Ive seen I will add more things to this thread soon, I just wanted to get the thread started Pictures will be added soon too so don't worry or freak out about pictures lol Like I said a few times I AM AND WILL TAKE ANY IDEAS YOU HAVE(: Well that's all for now but I will add more to this thread soon! Thanks Everyone!
[/center]

item.title: Derp-Scape (Taking suggestions for a new name)
item.dc:creator: @doup22 doup22
item.description:
@doup22 wrote:

Details:
[font=courier]Base: InsidiaX PI
Coders: Dustin (Me) & Geoff
Forums: Still in progress I will add them soon.[/font]

[center]Project:
I recently just started coding PI’s about 2 months ago which was around the time I started coding again in general. I didn’t think I would actually wanna release a server but as I worked on it I really felt that I could possibly make and release a good enough server for people to play on. I hope to get players when I do release but if I don’t then I don’t what can I do about it? I am still learning alot about coding PI base servers and I don’t plan to have a release real soon but I do plan to have a release. So I hope that you guys can give me some ideas and help me out along the way and wish me luck!(: Thanks guys!

Server Information:
-Economy Is getting cleaned up to perfect
-Donator Island is very unique and has lots to do
-There are certain areas for donors only
-Very good pking with working SOL and things like that
-Working curses
-Has pk shops and slayer point shop
-Almost all skills are 100% Herblore, Farming and Firemaking are the only three that I know aren’t
-Npc’s drop items such as: Godswords, Bandos armor, Arma armor etc…
-There is also Summoning and Hunter, Summoning needs some work but nothing much
-Working teletabs
-Frost Dragons with good drops
-Full brimhaven and taverly dungeons
-Perfect teleport GFX
-Custom skill ( Pking ) Thanks to InsidiaX
-Really nice skilling spot but it may be changed I don’t know yet

Note:
I will be adding more to this thread don’t worry(:
I am taking name suggestions for server(:
The server has some bugs that need worked out
If anyone wants to be a developer just PM me and tell me what you can do to help(:
Interfaces are really basic most servers have them from what Ive seen
I will add more things to this thread soon, I just wanted to get the thread started
Pictures will be added soon too so don’t worry or freak out about pictures lol
Like I said a few times I AM AND WILL TAKE ANY IDEAS YOU HAVE(:
Well that’s all for now but I will add more to this thread soon! Thanks Everyone!

[/center]

Read full topic
